## `r fontawesome::fa("battery-quarter", fill = "grey")` Part 1.

**Session 1. `r fontawesome::fa("handshake")` Monday, January 12.**

- Reading. Course syllabus (this document).

- Activity. Set up your free DataCamp account. Invitations have been sent to your UDEM student email.
- Activity. Define your team of no more than 4 members.
- Bonus points. Reto grupal. Al menos durante este semestre es necesario que te suscribas al canal de YouTube [ahyaentendi](https://www.youtube.com/@ahyaentendi). Si todo el grupo lo hace, entonces asigno +5 a todos mis alumnos de este grupo.

**Session 2. Thursday, January 15.**
